verse: प्राणो वा आशाया भूयान्यथा वा अरा नाभौ समर्पिता एवमस्मिन्प्राणे सर्वसमर्पितं प्राणः प्राणेन याति प्राणः प्राणं ददाति प्राणाय ददाति प्राणो ह पिता प्राणो माता प्राणो भ्राता प्राणः स्वसा प्राण आचार्यः प्राणो ब्राह्मणः॥

terms.प्राणाय (prāṇāya): for the breath, for the life force
terms.ब्राह्मणः (brāhmaṇaḥ): Brahmana, one who possesses spiritual knowledge

meaning: Meaning: Breath or desire, whichever is greater, is indeed committed within oneself (in the navel) like offspring. In this breath, everything is wholly committed, and by breath, breath moves. Breath gives breath for the breath, for the life force; indeed, breath is the father, breath is the mother, breath is the brother, breath is the sister, breath is the teacher, breath is the Brahmana (possessor of spiritual knowledge).
